title: Microsoft Windows 3.1. V.2. Intermediate to advanced skills
brief_description: This step-by-step training video is intended for use following “Microsoft Windows 3.1. V.1. Introductory skills”. Narrated by Sheila Swanson, you will learn how to simplify routine DOS tasks such as opening windows applications and ways to organise your hard disk efficiently; how to work between Windows applications; working with DOS programs in Windows and how to accessorise and customise your desktop. For an introduction to the program, see “Microsoft Windows 3.1. V.1. Introductory skills”
